ttp_template:
<group name="answer_ip_answer_ttl_dns_query_retries">
DNS Query  : {{DNS_QUERY | ORPHRASE}}
Transport  : {{TRANSPORT | ORPHRASE}}
Timeout  : {{TIMEOUT | ORPHRASE}}
Retries  : {{RETRIES | ORPHRASE}}
Server IP  : {{SERVER_IP | ORPHRASE}}
Status  : {{STATUS | ORPHRASE}}
  TTL  : {{ANSWER_TTL | ORPHRASE}}
  IP  : {{ANSWER_IP | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
DNS Query  : example.com
Transport  : UDP
Timeout    : 5
Retries    : 3
Server IP  : 8.8.8.8
Status     : Success
Answers    : 
  - A Record : 
      IP      : 93.184.216.34
      TTL     : 3599
  - A Record : 
      IP      : 93.184.216.35
      TTL     : 3599
textfsm_template:
Value DNS_QUERY (\S+)
Value TRANSPORT (\S+)
Value TIMEOUT (\d+)
Value RETRIES (\d+)
Value SERVER_IP (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)
Value STATUS (\S+)
Value ANSWER_TYPE (\S+)
Value ANSWER_IP (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)
Value ANSWER_TTL (\d+)

Start
  ^DNS\s+Query\s+:\s+${DNS_QUERY}\s*$$
  ^Transport\s+:\s+${TRANSPORT}\s*$$
  ^Timeout\s+:\s+${TIMEOUT}\s*$$
  ^Retries\s+:\s+${RETRIES}\s*$$
  ^Server\s+IP\s+:\s+${SERVER_IP}\s*$$
  ^Status\s+:\s+${STATUS}\s*$$
  ^Answers\s+:\s*$$
  ^\s+-\s+${ANSWER_TYPE}\s+:\s*$$
  ^\s+IP\s+:\s+${ANSWER_IP}\s*$$
  ^\s+TTL\s+:\s+${ANSWER_TTL}\s*$$ -> Record
